nodes.text: A hover car was a landspeeder in use on the planet Arcan IV. Lemo and Sanda's gang made use of the hover car when traveling about the commercial district, usually at breakneck speed. When Lando Calrissian and Chewbacca visited the world, they were forced to commandeer a hover car in order to make their way back to the Arcan IV Spaceport.
